violated_terms: Marketing of unapproved new animal drugs in violation of the FD&C Act
Misbranding of animal drugs under section 502(o) of the FD&C Act [21 U.S.C. § 352(o)]
Introduction of adulterated drugs under section 501(a)(5) of the FD&C Act [21 U.S.C. § 351(a)(5)]
Violation of section 301(a) of the FD&C Act [21 U.S.C. § 331(a)]
recommendations: Obtain an approved new animal drug application, conditionally approved new animal drug application, or index listing for the products.
Notify the FDA in writing of specific steps taken to address the violations within fifteen (15) working days.
Include an explanation of each step being taken to prevent the recurrence of violations, along with copies of related documentation.

violated_terms: Unapproved new drug under section 505(a) of the FD&C Act, 21 U.S.C. § 355(a)
Misbranded drug under section 502 of the FD&C Act, 21 U.S.C. § 352
Introduction or delivery for introduction of this product into interstate commerce prohibited under sections 301(a) and (d) of the FD&C Act, 21 U.S.C. § 331(a) and (d)
Violations of the FTC Act, 15 U.S.C. 41 et seq.
recommendations: Cease the sale of BetterFly and any similar products claiming to treat or prevent COVID-19.
Remove misleading claims from the website and promotional materials.
Provide a detailed response to the FDA and FTC within 48 hours outlining corrective actions.
Ensure that all advertising claims are supported by competent and reliable scientific evidence.

violated_terms: Manufacturing and distributing a new tobacco product without required marketing authorization (21 U.S.C. § 387j(c)(1)(A)(i)).
Product is adulterated under section 902(6)(A) of the FD&C Act (21 U.S.C. § 387b(6)(A)).
Product is misbranded under section 903(a)(6) of the FD&C Act (21 U.S.C. § 387c(a)(6)).
Failure to provide required report under section 905(j) of the FD&C Act (21 U.S.C. § 387e(j)).
recommendations: Submit a written response within 15 working days detailing corrective actions taken to address violations.
Discontinue the sale and distribution of the 13 Vapor Ripe Strawberry 3mg 20mL e-liquid product.
Ensure all tobacco products comply with the FD&C Act and FDA regulations.
Consider submitting a marketing authorization application for any new tobacco products.

violated_terms: Marketing new tobacco products without required premarket authorization.
Products are adulterated under section 902(6)(A) of the FD&C Act.
Products are misbranded under section 903(a)(6) of the FD&C Act.
recommendations: Discontinue the sale and distribution of the identified products.
Obtain the necessary premarket authorization for all tobacco products.
Submit a written response to the FDA within 15 working days detailing actions taken to address the violations.

violated_terms: Products are adulterated under section 402(a)(2)(C)(i) of the FD&C Act due to the presence of an unsafe food additive (CBD).
Introduction of adulterated foods into interstate commerce is prohibited under sections 301(ll) and 301(a) of the FD&C Act.
recommendations: Obtain premarket approval for the use of CBD in food products.
Ensure proper labeling of products to disclose the presence of CBD and any potential interactions with other ingredients like caffeine.
